feed.title: MSS CSEC
feed.subtitle: Markville's Computer Science and Engineering Club

entry.title: Welcome to this site!
entry.content:
Hello, person! We see you discovered our top-secret website-in-construction. Unfortunately, we have no content to offer but the fact that we’ll probably be back in September with a swanking new website to suit all of your MSS CSEC needs. Until then, have a great summer!

It is currently time to enable JavaScript, you dimwit.
